name: GuoTai JunAn (FuYi)
description: GuoTai JunAn (FuYi) is a comprehensive financial terminal integrated quotation price, information, exchange, financing, transaction, fund-raising and living. It is featured with market information overview, multi-category trading, data, real-time update, financing, daily-life transaction and so on.

zh_CN.description: 国泰君安证券（富易）是集行情、资讯、交易、理财、转账、融资、生活为一体的综合理财终端，提供全市场行情一览、多品种交易、资讯数据、实时更新、理财融资和生活转账等功能。
zh_CN.name: 国泰君安证劵（富易）
